mapper.select: SELECT sri.role_code FROM role_info sri LEFT JOIN role_user sru ON sru.role_id = sri.id LEFT JOIN user_info sui ON sui.id = sru.user_id WHERE sri.status = 0 AND sui.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT sri.id, sri.role_name, sri.role_desc, sri.status, sri.created_by, userInfo.user_account FROM role_info sri LEFT JOIN user_info userInfo ON userInfo.id = sri.created_by WHERE sri.delete_flag = 0
